name: page-preview
description: Quickly see how each page looks at a glance and manage your site more efficiently.

scripts.start: composer install && npm install --production=false && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint-js && npm run lint-style
scripts.build-release: npm install --production=false && composer install && npm run build && npm run make-pot
scripts.lint-release: npm install && composer install && npm run lint
